attributes.action: to pay carers who have a career of their own plus a caring responsiblity outside of their career/job to be awarded carers allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: carers/siblings/supporters of people who have care needs should be paid an allowance for their caring time and should not be penalised/means tested because they are in gainful employment of their choosing. Caring often takes place outside of the individuals employment and therefore allowances should be paid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
